name: @repo/e2e
description: WebdriverIO Electron Service E2E Test Suite

scripts.clean: pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./test/js ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml ./logs && tsx ../scripts/clean-test-apps.ts
scripts.clean:logs: pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./logs && pnpm dlx shx mkdir -p ./logs
scripts.init-e2es: pnpm dlx shx mkdir -p ./test/js && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.test:builder:cjs: cross-env PLATFORM=builder MODULE_TYPE=cjs pnpm run test:matrix
scripts.test:builder:esm: cross-env PLATFORM=builder MODULE_TYPE=esm pnpm run test:matrix
scripts.test:forge:cjs: cross-env PLATFORM=forge MODULE_TYPE=cjs pnpm run test:matrix
scripts.test:forge:esm: cross-env PLATFORM=forge MODULE_TYPE=esm pnpm run test:matrix
scripts.test:no-binary:cjs: cross-env PLATFORM=no-binary MODULE_TYPE=cjs BINARY=false pnpm run test:matrix
scripts.test:no-binary:esm: cross-env PLATFORM=no-binary MODULE_TYPE=esm BINARY=false pnpm run test:matrix
